title: The Changing world of Charles Dickens
creator_credit: John irvin, Jonathan Hansen, Allan King and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Recreates scenes from “David Copperfield”, “Oliver Twist”, “Dombey and Son”, “Great Expectations” and “Hard Times” in order to illustrate how Dickens not only reflected the harshness of his times but sought to change the social inequities as well. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
